thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Peter Anderson

author: Peter Anderson
title: Peter Anderson
text:
It took three goes at trying to book with Cruisefinder and as soon as we paid we were dumped.
First time cruisers and a mature family of three couples.
We did not know the routine....so what.
Top deck, balcony suites at high price, yet we were split on both sides of ship.
so what.. we have your money. We had to talk directly with P&O to find out about how everything works.
so sad.
